Good Luck!    --Rod

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:           Allow the force to present the solution I always say! The Mini Box builder has offered a deal to get mine manufactured in an almost painless to me way. I haven't said yes, or no--yet.
 
 I'm going to the Stanley tomorrow afternoon and should be able to get a look at the Mini box. I'm dreading getting caught up in some unwanted attention. 
 
 Frank-S
